member.name: MIB_UDPROW_OWNER_MODULE
member.summary: The MIB_UDPROW_OWNER_MODULE structure contains an entry from the IPv4 User Datagram Protocol (UDP) listener table on the local computer. This entry also also includes any available ownership data and the process ID (PID) that issued the call to the function for the UDP endpoint.

summary.para: The IPv4 address of the UDP endpoint on the local computer.
A value of zero indicates a UDP listener willing to accept datagrams for any IP interface associated with the local computer.

member.name: MIB_UDPROW_OWNER_MODULE.dwLocalPort
member.summary: The port number of the UDP endpoint on the local computer. This member is stored in network byte order.

member.name: MIB_UDPROW_OWNER_MODULE.dwOwningPid
member.summary: The PID of the process that issued the call to the function for the UDP endpoint. This member is set to 0 when the PID is unavailable.

member.name: MIB_UDPROW_OWNER_MODULE.liCreateTimestamp
member.summary: A structure that indicates when the call to the function for the UDP endpoint occurred.

member.name: MIB_UDPROW_OWNER_MODULE.SpecificPortBind
member.summary: A value that indicates if a specific port was specified in the last context bind operation.

member.name: MIB_UDPROW_OWNER_MODULE.dwFlags
member.summary: A set of flags. This member is not currently used.

member.name: MIB_UDPROW_OWNER_MODULE.OwningModuleInfo
member.summary: An array of opaque data that contains ownership information.
